ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds boneless beef sirloin steak, cut into strips
1 (14.8 ounce) package KRAFT RECIPE MAKERS Sweet & Sour Chicken
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whole green beans, thawed
instructions: Cook rice as directed on package, omitting salt.
Stir-fry meat in half the Simmer Sauce in large skillet on medium heat 6 to 8min.
Add vegetables and remaining Simmer Sauce to skillet; cook and stir 2 to 4 min.
Stir in Finishing Sauce and chili sauce; cook 1 to 2 min.
title: KRAFT RECIPE MAKERS Asian Style Chili Steak and String Beans

normalized_ingredients.I5mKmufwm: KRAFT RECIPE MAKERS Sweet & Sour Chicken

steps: Cook rice as directed on package, omitting salt.

Stir-fry meat in half the Simmer Sauce in large skillet on medium heat 6 to 8min. or until done. Add vegetables and remaining Simmer Sauce to skillet; cook and stir 2 to 4 min. or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Stir in Finishing Sauce and chili sauce; cook 1 to 2 min. or until heated through.
